info.description: Photo management system API with asset upload, processing, and organization features
info.title: Lumilio-Photos Manager API

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of albums for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Create a new album for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a specific album by its ID

400.description: Invalid album ID or request data

delete.description: Delete an album by its ID

get.description: Retrieve all assets in a specific album

post.description: Add an asset to a specific album

400.description: Invalid album ID or asset ID

500.description: Failed to add asset to album

delete.description: Remove an asset from a specific album

400.description: Invalid album ID or asset ID

500.description: Failed to remove asset from album

400.description: Invalid album ID or asset ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of assets. Filter by type(s) or owner. Assets are sorted by taken_time (photo capture time or video record time). At least one filter parameter is required.

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Upload a single photo, video, audio file, or document to the system. The file is staged in a repository and queued for processing.

parameters.description: Repository UUID (uses default repository if not provided)
parameters.name: repository_id

parameters.description: Client-calculated BLAKE3 hash of the file
parameters.name: X-Content-Hash

400.description: Bad request - no file provided or parse error

post.description: Unified batch upload endpoint that supports both small files and chunked large files. Field names should follow format: single_{session_id} for single files or chunk_{session_id}_{index}_{total} for chunks.
post.summary: Batch upload assets with chunk support

parameters.description: Repository UUID (uses default repository if not provided)
parameters.name: repository_id

parameters.description: Single file upload - use format: single_{session_id}
parameters.name: file

parameters.description: Chunked file upload - use format: chunk_{session_id}_{index}_{total}
parameters.name: file

400.description: Bad request - no files provided or parse error

get.description: Get current upload configuration including chunk size and concurrency limits based on system memory
Get detailed progress information for upload sessions

post.description: Filter assets using comprehensive filtering options including repository selection, RAW, rating, liked status, filename patterns, date ranges, camera make, and lens

get.description: Get available camera makes and lenses for filter dropdowns
Get all assets that have been liked/favorited
Get assets with a specific rating (0-5)

post.description: Search assets using either filename matching or semantic vector search. Can be combined with comprehensive filters including repository selection.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all supported asset types in the system.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific asset. Optionally include thumbnails, tags, albums, species predictions, OCR results, face recognition, and AI descriptions.

put.description: Update the specific metadata of an asset (e.g., photo EXIF data, video metadata).

delete.description: Soft delete an asset by marking it as deleted. The physical file is not removed.

get.description: Retrieve all albums that contain a specific asset

Update the like/favorite status of a specific asset

get.description: Serve the original file content for an asset by asset ID. Returns the file as an octet-stream.

Update both the rating (0-5) and like/favorite status of a specific asset
